chapter.text: 55|1|a l laoh mha sabborsa .
55|2|trong ban bangrien kompir kuor an( dl mnoussa lok) .
55|3|trong ban bangkeut mnoussa lok .
55|4|trong ban bangrien ke aoy cheh briyay sapvobebyeang .
55|5|preahatity  ning preah chnt thveudamnaer tam karkamnt da cheak  leak .
55|6|haey roukkhcheate ning daemchheu neanea saou chout( champoh a l laoh) .
55|7|haey mekh  trong ban leuk vea aoy khpasa  haey trong ban bangkeut  aoy mean pheap you tde thmr( now leu phendei)
55|8|daembi komaoy puok anak bampean leu pheap you tde thmr noh .
55|9|haey chaur puok anak brate b tde knong kar thloeng aoy ban troemotrauv haey  kom thveu aoy khveah phnekachonhching aoy saoh .
55|10|haey phendei  trong ban bangkeut vea( reabasmae) samreab satv  lok .
55|11|daoy now leu vea  mean phlechheu  ning daem lmeu del mean changkom  phle cheachraen .
55|12|ning kreabthonhnhocheate del mean saambk  promteang roukkhcheate del  mean klenokraaub .
55|13|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|14|trong ban bangkeut mnoussa lok( a da) pi deiidth snguot dauchchea  dei delke saun chea saamphear .
55|15|haey trong ban bangkeut chin ampi andataphleung .
55|16|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|17|( a l laoh) chea mcheasa kanleng teangpir nei preahatity reah ( pel rdauvokdaw  ning rdauvornga)  ning chea mcheasa kanleng teangpir nei preah  atity lich( pel rdauvokdaw  ning rdauvornga) .
55|18|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|19|trong ban thveu aoy samoutr pir( tuksaeab ning tukabrai) chuobaknea .
55|20|now rveang vea teangpir mean rneang khand min aoy chreabchaul knea .
55|21|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|22|kchkhyang  ning phkathm chenhpi vea teangpir( samoutr tuksaeab ning tukabrai) .
55|23|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|24|haey neavea thom  del thveudamnaer now leu phtaisamoutr hak  dauchchea phnom noh  kuchea kammosetthi robsa trong .
55|25|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|26|vi  teangoasa now leu phendei nung vineasa a nd reay .
55|27|haey vng ph kd r nei mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat) del mha  khpangkhpasa ning mha thkomthkaeng temuoyokt del now kngvongsa chea amt .
55|28|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|29|anak del now leumekh cheachraen chean  nung phendei tengte  buongsuong som pi trong .  trong riebcham kechchakar robsa trong chea riengrealthngai .
55|30|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|31|yeung nung thveukear touteat puok anak teangoasa  ao mnoussaalok  ning chin
55|32|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh

55|33|ao banda chin ning mnoussa lok.  brasenbae puok anakmean  samotthaphap ach thveudamnaer chhlangkat krobtisati nei mekh cheachraen chean  ning phendei  chaur puok anak chhlangkat choh .  puok anak min ach thveudamnaer chhlang  kat ban laey  leuklengte mean karoanounhnhat( pi yeung) .
55|34|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|35|mean ke banhchoun andataphleung  ning lohtheato romleay tow dot  ke teangpir( mnoussaalok  ning chin)  haey ke teangpir min ach reareang  ban laey .
55|36|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|37|nowpel del mekh be  reah bek( now thngai barlok) ku vea  mean pnrkrahm phka kau leab dauchchea be  r ng del kampoung pouh .
55|38|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|39|haey now thngai noh  mnoussaalok  ning chin min trauv ke suor  ampi babakamm robsa ke laey .
55|40|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh

55|41|puok del sang babakamm nung trauv ke skal tamory sanhnhea  saamkeal robsa puokke( mean pnrkhmaw now leu phtaimoukh)  haey puokke  trauv ke chab sak bangheuy  ning cheung( baoh kroveng chaul tow knong nork) .
55|42|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|43|nih kuchea nork cheu han nam del puok br pru td babakamm  bdeseth nung vea .
55|44|puokke vilovl rveang nork cheu han nam  ning tuk kdaw del pouh  yeang khlang .
55|45|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|46|haey samreab anaknea del ban kaotakhlach nowpel  brachhommoukh champoh mcheasa robsa ke( daembi katsechakdei) ku ttuol ban  thansuokr pir .
55|47|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|48|( thansuokr teangpir noh) mean mekchheu del mean phle krob  braphet .
55|49|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|50|nowknong thansuokr teangpir noh tiet  mean braphp tuk pir haur .
55|51|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|52|nowknong noh tiet der  mean phlechheu krob braphet chea kou  .
55|53|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|54|puokke angkouyophaek khluon now leu pouk del kraloprom am thveu pi sautr  krasa .  haey phlechheu nei thansuokr teangpir noh ku now kber puokke .
55|55|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh

55|56|now leu pouk noh mean sreitepoabsaar cheachraen del min samlung  meul anaknea phe  sa ng krawpi svami robsa puok neang laey del kmean mnoussa lok  ning chin na thleab bahpeal puok neang pimoun puokke( svami) laey .
55|57|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|58|samrosa robsa puok neang  hakdauchchea tbaungottum  ning phkathm .
55|59|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|60|kmean kar tabasnang champoh ampeula krawpi ampeula noh laey .
55|61|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|62|haey krawpi thansuokr teangpir nih  mean thansuokr pir phe  sang  tiet .
55|63|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|64|thansuokr teangpir noh mean pnrbaitng chasa .
55|65|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|66|nowknong thansuokr teangpir noh  mean braphp tuk pir banh tuk  chenh( kmeanochhbchhr) .
55|67|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|68|nowknong thansuokr teangpir noh tiet  mean phlechheu krob braphet  ning phle lmeu  haeyning phle ttum .
55|69|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|70|nowknong thansuokr teangnoh  mean sreitepoabsaar kroblokkha  saa t cheachraen  .
55|71|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|72|ku banda sreitepoabsaar del trauv ban ke theroksaa daoy kng  vongsa nowknong ponlea .
55|73|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|74|del kmean mnoussaalok  ning chin na thleab bahpeal puok neang  pimoun puokke( svami) laey .
55|75|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|76|daoy puokke angkouyophaek now leu khnaey del mean sraom pnrbaitng  promteang kam real prom da la braneit .
